changes_made: Added import for useNavigate hook from react-router-dom
Initialized navigate function using useNavigate() hook
Replaced toast notification with navigation to /settings route in Settings menu item onClick handler
file_insights.impact: Header component now provides functional navigation to settings page instead of placeholder toast message

patterns_discovered.description: Standard pattern of importing useNavigate hook and using it in event handlers to programmatically navigate to routes
Combining menu close action with navigation action in a single onClick handler

gotchas_discovered.gotcha: Menu state must be closed before or with navigation
gotchas_discovered.description: The implementation correctly calls handleMenuClose() before navigate() to ensure menu is dismissed when navigating
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Pattern already correctly implemented in this change

approach_outcome.summary: Successfully replaced placeholder toast functionality with actual navigation to settings page

recommendations.rationale: Navigation now points to /settings - ensure this route is properly defined in the router configuration

recommendations.recommendation: Add settings page component if not present
recommendations.rationale: User will navigate to /settings but component should exist and be accessible
If settings page is heavy, may want to add loading indication while navigating
